name: Disc Disc Revolution
description:
Music by Symmetrical Audio! Thank you @getdizzzy!

https://soundcloud.com/symmetrical-audio/sets/disc-jam

Made for the Disc Room Game Jam
Disc Disc Revolution is like Disc Room. You need to hit the beats to gain points too though. Very epic.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys

R to Restart the room
